summary: A Housecarl of Windhelm! Replaces Lydia with a Stonger bigger Khajit and he lvls up to 90
descriptionHtml:
Pantera Replaces Lydia! He is a big guy and can back you better than Lydia.
Comes equiped with Blades armor (no Helm) and a Daedric greatsword also as a bonus he lvls up with you but unlike Lydia he lvls up to lvl 90.
This mod will be a work in progress! I will be changing the Dialogue from the jarl  to match up with Pantera instead of saying lydia + im gonna be adding a custom script and voice over in future. 
Endorse me if you enjoy this and thanks guys!
author: Rodrick1981
